thread.title: Hrithik’s fanboy moment with Sachin Tendulkar
thread.title_full: Hrithik’s fanboy moment with Sachin Tendulkar

title: Hrithik’s fanboy moment with Sachin Tendulkar
text: Be the first one to review. We have sent you a verification email. To verify, just follow the link in the message Bollywood celebs' Instagram pics you should not miss! TNN | Feburary 02, 2017 1 /157 Spotted: Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt enjoying a bike ride on the streets of Mumbai Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt are starring in one of the most awaited films of this year 'Badrinath Ki Dulhania'. The duo launched the trailer amidst much fanfare in a theater in Mumbai. However, that was not the only highlight of the day. Apparently, Badri and his dulhania made quite an entry at the venue where the trailer launch was held. The dapper Varun drove a Royal Enfield with Alia riding pillion and boy do they look adorable. Karan Johar shared the picture on his Twitter handle saying, "Badri and Vaidehi are coming to share their second love story from the DULHANIA series!" Varun also shared a video of the same where he revealed that the last time the 'Udta Punjab' actress enjoyed a bike ride was 10 years back. Scroll down for more.
